menu.name: margharita
menu.description: Pizza for poor people. If you're broke or the paycheck is near but not there yet, you may order this one to get a mediocre excuse for a pizza. Delish.

menu.name: salame
menu.description: If you're a carnivore, you might consider this pizza. No vegan BS, just meat for reasonable price.

menu.name: funghi
menu.description: If you don't like any particular flavor and crave for pizza as dull as your life, it's an excellent choice. You will regret it, but at least you saved some money.

menu.name: dellaPologna
menu.description: This is a pizza, that we recommend for our friends from Poland. Large amounts of onion will make you cry, recalling the homeland of Onion People

menu.name: turco
menu.description: Looks like someone put cat food on it, but is actually quite tasty. Contains meat of unknown origin

menu.name: vegetariana
menu.description: We put it so far in our menu, 'cause we are not entirely proud of it. Our boss made us prepare a pizza for vegans and here it is.

menu.name: broccoli
menu.description: Another vegan option containing little magic trees. It is still an unsolved mystery, why would you choose this one, but this is a free country, I guess.

menu.name: spinachi
menu.description: Only for masochists. We made it expensive, so you wouldn't pick it and had a nice day instead.

menu.name: strano
menu.description: Pizza that our chef prepares out of trash and leftovers, so it's eco. Also cheap, because it's way past its expiration date
